pr_title: NMS-12847: SslContextFactory needs to be changed to SslContextFactory.Server in jetty.xml

timeline.message: NMS-12847: SslContextFactory needs to be changed to SslContextFactory.Server in jetty.xml
Need to use $ notation, not ., for nested class access in jetty.xml.

timeline.bodyText:
@RangerRick @jeffgdotorg Just as a heads up. It seems like this is something we cannot cleanly merge forward to 26.x. The etc/examples/jetty.xml has changes preventing merging forward. I've just noticed this by testing with 26.1.3 and here is what I did to get it working:
root@ubuntu:/usr/share/opennms/etc# diff jetty.xml examples/jetty.xml
42a43
>   <!--
56c57
<   <New id="sslContextFactory" class="org.eclipse.jetty.util.ssl.SslContextFactory$Server">
---
>   <New id="sslContextFactory" class="org.eclipse.jetty.util.ssl.SslContextFactory">
114a116
>   -->

I've tested with Let's Encrypt certificates in the Java Keystore file and everything worked fine.
timeline.author: indigo423
